remarks: Obsolete version of ~ efabl as of 5-Mar-2020.  The image of a subgroup of the group ` + ` , under the exponential function of a scaled complex number, is an Abelian group.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
efghgrpOLD.1 $e |- S = { y | E. x e. X y = ( exp ` ( A x. x ) ) } $.
efghgrpOLD.2 $e |- G = ( x. |` ( S X. S ) ) $.
efghgrpOLD.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
efghgrpOLD.4 $e |- ( ph -> X C_ CC ) $.
efghgrpOLD.5 $e |- ( + |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( SubGrpOp ` + ) $.
efghgrpOLD $p |- ( ph -> G e. AbelOp ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
